contentheadline.headline: Secretary of State for Commonwealth Affairs

contentrichtext.text: The position of '''Secretary of State for Commonwealth Affairs''' was created on 1 August 1966 by the merger of the old positions of [[Secretary of State for Commonwealth Relations]] and [[Secretary of State for the Colonies]]. The position dealt with British relations with members of the [[Commonwealth of Nations]].
